lines.text: Per telephone conversation with Dick Wolfe today, he advises the test batch of
Consolidated Cocoa without the flow agent has been run and the reports state
the material was satisfactory. Please advise if I can have Consolidated ship for
the balance of 1991 Cocoa without N-zorbit.
The test run of Cocoa Barry's new nitrogen process without flow agent was
reported to havc run satisfactorily. Cocoa Barry has just shipped in a
truckload of the new nitrogen process with flow agent. Please advise as soon
as possible if this runs satisfaciorily as we have some of their trucks on hold.
If this is okay, I will advise them to bring in all future material with nitrogen
I understand from Dick that the test material from Gerkins has been debagged
and placed into totcs. Please advise how this runs in Manufacturing and we
will discuss at our quarterly flavoring meeting.

full_text:
RJR
Scptember 11, 1991
FLV05
TO:
Mr. Roger Faircloth
Dr. Brian Lawrence
Mr. Dick Wolfe
Mr. Mark Miller
Ms. Rence Pogrow
REFERENCE:
Cocoa
Consolidated Cocoa
Per telephone conversation with Dick Wolfe today, he advises the test batch of
Consolidated Cocoa without the flow agent has been run and the reports state
the material was satisfactory. Please advise if I can have Consolidated ship for
the balance of 1991 Cocoa without N-zorbit.
Cocoa Barry
The test run of Cocoa Barry's new nitrogen process without flow agent was
reported to havc run satisfactorily. Cocoa Barry has just shipped in a
truckload of the new nitrogen process with flow agent. Please advise as soon
as possible if this runs satisfaciorily as we have some of their trucks on hold.
If this is okay, I will advise them to bring in all future material with nitrogen
process without N-zorbit.
Gerkins Cocoa
I understand from Dick that the test material from Gerkins has been debagged
and placed into totcs. Please advise how this runs in Manufacturing and we
will discuss at our quarterly flavoring meeting.
Linda B. Stoker
51290 2913
